page.title: 14WEST FIFE ENTERPRISE
page.content: In the village of Torryburn, on the site of the old Nursery School is the West Fife Enterprise in the Community Asaociation building.This is a training Centre for the young and unemployed.This was established in 1983 with funding from the{Manpower {Services.}In the future they hope to get{financial assistance}from the {Common Market.}Facilities include a {laundry, a woodwork workshop and an {upholstery workshop.}There are kitchen facilities also.A{Co-operative involving local women doing knitting was recently set up.{Outside projects include the setting up of a Market Garden in High Valleyfield and the renovation of an old house in Low Valleyfield. Volunteers are needed to train these people in various skills. Those who attend the centre are not paid but receive training.
